title: Fascists R People 2, Dudes ARE Gross? 05.10.22

description:
In episode 1244, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and co-host of The Bechdel Cast, Caitlin Durante to discuss... How The Democratic Party Works … Is Very Depressing / Infuriating, New Study: Dudes are pretty gross? And more!

  1. How The Democratic Party Works … Is Very Depressing / Infuriating
  2. Mitch McConnell Said Something That Can Help Democrats Win the Midterms
